评论详情: Fits well (5’2”, 105 lb, 32c). Soft and can dress up or down.

Love this shirt. Quality and design are beautiful! However, it runs very small. I usually wear a small or sometimes medium if I want things not as fitted but this was way too small. I would size up at least 2 sizes if you don’t want it super tight.

LOVE this top. It fit my new curvy post pregnancy shape very well. Even though it is form fitting, it hugs in a very flattering way. I paired it with some black trousers and I got so many compliments on it!
Soft, great fit, thick material and stretchy! Love this top for work or for more casual wear.
Overall it was very soft. It was a gift, and person liked it.

Well my daughter says so.  She got it for Xmas and loves it.  Sizing seems to be accurate and she says it’s very comfortable.  Color seems a little different on line compared to the real color but not a big deal.  Fabric is soft and it is very versatile. Overall a great purchase.
The blouse is soft, true to size and good quality. Looks nice with jeans or dress pants.
I love this top but I didn't realize how fitted it was.  It shows all my bumps so I will pass it down to my daughter who is much slimmer than I.
It's one of my favorite shirts, the material is comfortable and pretty warm for a short sleeve, the material is a comfortable thickness, I think it works well for different temperatures
Great alternative to a t shirt.  Looks small out of the package but they stretch.  I have not washed yet so will see how they wear over time
I love this simple top. The color is vibrant and the fit is perfect. Bought another one in tan.

This top is beautiful and great quality. It’s not see through and very well made. Fits true to size - I am normally a 2/4 or XS/S in tops and the S fit perfectly. It’s longer so nice to be able to tuck into pants.
I would size down. It’s a nice looking shirt.
I am normally a small or XS and this shirt is way too tight. I missed the return /exchange window by a couple of days. I would have happily exchanged it as it’s a nice shirt
Love pairing these with slacks or jeans for a nice work outfit. Stretchy top and works for a longer torso and wil give plenty of stretch where you need it.  comfortable and color is a bright white.
This is a cute shirt and the quality is great. The material is thick and looks high quality. Definitely a closet staple
I love this top so much that I bought another! The pink is sooo beautiful… nice thick material (not see through), comfortable, and it washes well. Love it!
Love this shirt! Super cute and is a nice thick material

Great fabric for spring or fall.
Very comfortable and super cute. It is a longer top so no great coverage.

Pretty and form fitting but so soft and stretchy

评论概述: Feels nice but not for large bust.
评论详情: I wear a 36G bra, and the vertical lines of this shirt stretched across my chest so comically I immediately pulled it back off. That being said, the fabric felt really nice, soft, stretchy and cool. It’s like a light sweater thickness but the coolness of a performance knit almost??? I don’t know how to describe it. The color was also very nice, and I like the open neckline and slightly longer sleeves. It will suit someone with less abrupt proportions lol.

I wanted to like this, in my opinion it looks very cheap. I really loved the picture online so I bought it but I was  very disappointed . The material is very thin and stretchy the kind once it’s washed you can forget about it .
I ordered the shirt in a medium. It’s true to size very comfortable and flattering! The material is a nice feel. and washes really nice!!
Had to wear it a little while before it fit well.  At first, I didn't like the way it bucked up.  But I wore it anyway and it sort of conformed to my shape,  I love it now
Comfortable and feels great! True to size! You can dress up or down!
Fits perfect. Looks great on camera for viftual meetings. Very professional looking.
Very simple, cute fall shirt. I was surprised by how soft it felt on the skin. Definitely would recommend.
This top is perfect for work. The white isn’t see through as long as you have a tan bra!
This looks and fits just like the photos. It’s very cute and would recommend!

The "rust" color is like burnt orange, which is what I had hoped for as a Texas Longhorns fan. I'm glad I got the small -- I'm quite small on my upper half-- because it is snug but not overly so, and no gapping around the neckline. Haven't worn it outside yet, just tried it on, but I really like the design and the boat neck is very flattering.
Casual or office wear, this top is perfect. I tucked it in as I thought it was a little long, but I loved the color and shape of the neckline. Good material too

I love this shirt!  Hugs my body just wonderfully as well. Always comes out of the dryer looking like it shrunk, but in reality it has not.  Very stretchy material.  Looks great on me, in my humble opinion.I am 5'4", weigh 140, bought size M.
I have been looking for this color top for a specific skirt. The fabric is soft and very comfortable.

Stretch material. Not too thick seem just right. I’m a tall girl seems like it might be just a smidge short length wise but i think it’ll be fine. The fit overall is nice. Going to wear later this month.

This is like those cheap shirts you see in gift shops by the beach. I got a small because that is normally my size. This was the size of a washcloth. When you put it on it stretches tremendously, so it technically "fits." The pictures make it look elegant, but make no mistake, this is trash.
It’s a little longer than I expected but still pretty good and looks great. It’s see through

Wore this to work looks fabulous 👌
Very cute and true to size! It looks tiny when you take it out of the packaging, but it stretches and looks so good!

I never write reviews. I rely on them to make purchases but usually, can't be bothered to write one. This shirt is awesome! I am 5 months postpartum and was looking for something with stretch and on the thicker side to hide my belly. This shirt is so flattering! I love the U neckline, the ribbing is thick enough to hide imperfections but not too thick and I love the black/white contrast. I'm only 5'1 and the length is great too. Love that it is short sleeved, but not too short. I am already looking at purchasing it in another color and long sleeve too.
I love this top!  It's much better than I expected.  Highly recommend.
Bought it in black and also in white. Great quality—especially for the price. Looks more expensive than the price suggests!

I absolutely love this shirt. Quality is soft. And fits just as expected. Will order more in different colors.

I love a good white top but don’t like spending a ton of money on them because it’s white and let’s face it, they look best when it’s new and bright white. The material is thick and hangs well. It’s a great value for an easy dress up or down every day top and you don’t feel bad in case you drip any coffee on yourself.

This is so comfy and amazing quality.  Reminds me of the good ole days in the 90s where we used to wear these lol. Great for business casual and TTS. Not see through at all. Will honestly buy more colors.
